</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the given effect on the given camera. If you want to switch the screen directly to the first-person, aiming, third-person or group view of an object, use [[switchCamera]] instead. The effect type "Terminate" is used to exit the current camera view and switch back to the player's view. Does not need [[camCommit]].
<br><br>
Since Arma 3 v1.73.142217, it is possible to terminate individual r2t source. For example: <code>cam [[cameraEffect]] ["terminate", "back", "rtt1"]; // would terminate "rtt1" r2t source
cam [[cameraEffect]] ["terminate", "back"]; // would terminate all r2t sources</code><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value> One cannot mix and match [[cameraEffect]] and can either have multiple [[r2t]] cameras or a single camera for the whole screen. If one needs a background stream overlayed with [[r2t]] streams, this could be achieved by creating an object and using [[switchCamera]] to switch to it for background image, while using [[cameraEffect]] for [[r2t]] overlay (see Example 4)</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera '''cameraEffect''' [effectName, effectPosition, r2tName] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - object of type "camera" </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [effectName, effectPosition, r2tName]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> effectName: [[String]] - the effect type (defined in main config or [[Description.ext#CfgCameraEffects|CfgCameraEffects]] >> Array). Defaults are: <tt>"Internal"</tt>, <tt>"External"</tt>, <tt>"Fixed"</tt>, <tt>"FixedWithZoom"</tt>, <tt>"Terminate"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> effectPosition: [[String]] - position of the effect. One of: <tt>"TOP"</tt>, <tt>"LEFT"</tt>, <tt>"RIGHT"</tt>, <tt>"FRONT"</tt>, <tt>"BACK"</tt>, <tt>"LEFT FRONT"</tt>, <tt>"RIGHT FRONT"</tt>, <tt>"LEFT BACK"</tt>, <tt>"RIGHT BACK"</tt>, <tt>"LEFT TOP"</tt>, <tt>"RIGHT TOP"</tt>, <tt>"FRONT TOP"</tt>, <tt>"BACK TOP"</tt>, <tt>"BOTTOM"</tt>. These are usually used with "Fixed" and "FixedWithZoom" effect types. If not sure which position to use, set it to "BACK"; </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> r2tName (Optional): [[String]] - [[Procedural_Textures#Render_To_Texture|Render To Texture]] surface reference </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER5</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "BACK"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["internal", "back", "rendersurface"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>cam = "seagull" [[camCreate]] ([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,100]);
cam [[cameraEffect]] ["FIXED", "LEFT TOP"];
cam [[camCommand]] "MANUAL ON";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>_ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty" [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscPicture", -1];
_ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0.5, 0, 0.5, 0.5];
_ctrl [[ctrlSetText]] "#(argb,512,512,1)r2t(rtt1,1.0)";
_ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
_cam1 = "camera" [[camCreate]] ([[ASLtoAGL]] [[eyePos]] [[player]] [[vectorAdd]] [0, -10, 0]);
_cam1 [[cameraEffect]] ["Internal", "Back", "rtt1"];
_cam2 = "Land_HandyCam_F" [[createVehicle]] [0,0,0];
_cam2 [[enableSimulation]] false;
_cam2 [[setPos]] ([[ASLtoAGL]] [[eyePos]] [[player]] [[vectorAdd]] [0, 10, 0]);
_cam2 [[setDir]] (_cam2 [[getDir]] [[player]]);
[[switchCamera]] _cam2;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE4</name>=<value>
